participant_1.background:
My parents are very supportive of my interests, even if they don't always understand them.
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
I don't mind my family, but we don't have a lot in common.
I like to go to museums on the weekend to learn new things and experience different cultures.
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.

participant_2.background:
I like to dress well and be well-groomed.
i do not like coffee.
my parents are lawyers.
i work in academia at a local university.
i lease my car.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do on the weekend?
I like to go to museums. I love to learn new things and experience different cultures.
That's cool! I like to do that too. I also like to read my horoscope and write my own poems.
I've never been into horoscopes or poetry, but I like to read a lot too. I'm more into history and science.
That's cool too. I like to learn about different cultures and history. I also love to write poetry. It's a way for me to express myself.
I can see why you like to write poetry. It's a great way to express yourself. I'm more of a visual person. I like to paint and draw.
That's cool too. I like to paint and draw too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
It's not about being good at it. It's about the process. It's a way to relax and express yourself.
I agree. I like to paint and draw because it's a way for me to relax and clear my head.
I'm glad you find it relaxing. It's a great way to relieve stress.
